PA.definition: public area attendant (tasked with cleaning the public areas of a hotel); marketing assistant; sales assistant

PA部.definition: hotel staff work unit tasked with keeping the public areas of a hotel clean

PK.definition: (slang) to take on; to challenge; to go head to head; showdown; comparison

PU.definition: the degree of suspicion that a woman might, after she marries, cheat on her husband (abbr. for "paternity uncertainty")

PUA.definition: (neologism c. 2019) to exert control over (sb) by means of psychological manipulation (e.g. negging); a person who does so (loanword from "pickup artist")

P圖.definition: (Internet slang) to photoshop a picture; photoshopped picture

P擋.definition: park (gear); program mode (on a digital camera)
